trans-unit.source: This structure defines the dimensions information of a Windows-based device-independent bitmap (DIB)

seg-source.mrk: This structure defines the dimensions information of a Windows-based device-independent bitmap (DIB)

target.mrk: This structure defines the dimensions information of a Windows-based device-independent bitmap (DIB)

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes required by the structure, minus the size of the RGBQuad data

seg-source.mrk: The number of bytes required by the structure, minus the size of the RGBQuad data

target.mrk: The number of bytes required by the structure, minus the size of the RGBQuad data

trans-unit.source: Specifies the width of the bitmap, in pixels

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the width of the bitmap, in pixels

target.mrk: Specifies the width of the bitmap, in pixels

trans-unit.source: Specifies the height of the bitmap, in pixels

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the height of the bitmap, in pixels

target.mrk: Specifies the height of the bitmap, in pixels

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of planes for the target device. This must be set to 1

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the number of planes for the target device.

target.mrk: Specifies the number of planes for the target device.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of compression for a compressed bottom-up bitmap

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the type of compression for a compressed bottom-up bitmap

target.mrk: Specifies the type of compression for a compressed bottom-up bitmap

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size, in bytes, of the image

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the size, in bytes, of the image

target.mrk: Specifies the size, in bytes, of the image

trans-unit.source: Specifies the horizontal resolution, in pixels-per-meter, of the target device for the bitmap

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the horizontal resolution, in pixels-per-meter, of the target device for the bitmap

target.mrk: Specifies the horizontal resolution, in pixels-per-meter, of the target device for the bitmap

trans-unit.source: Specifies the vertical resolution, in pixels-per-meter, of the target device for the bitmap

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the vertical resolution, in pixels-per-meter, of the target device for the bitmap

target.mrk: Specifies the vertical resolution, in pixels-per-meter, of the target device for the bitmap

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of color indexes in the color table that are actually used by the bitmap

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the number of color indexes in the color table that are actually used by the bitmap

target.mrk: Specifies the number of color indexes in the color table that are actually used by the bitmap

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of color indexes that are required for displaying the bitmap

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the number of color indexes that are required for displaying the bitmap

target.mrk: Specifies the number of color indexes that are required for displaying the bitmap
